title: Cody Simpson says Miley Cyrus 'won't listen to him' in tense phone call
text:
An exasperated Cody Simpson was overheard complaining about his new love Miley Cyrus while enjoying a swim at a Sydney pool.

Simpson, 22, who has been in Australia to film the surprise TV hit The Masked Singer, was on the phone to a friend from Andrew Boy Charlton Pool on Thursday morning, when he was heard discussing his new romance.

'We had a weird one yesterday... not really an argument but she kind of shut down,' Simpson was overheard saying.

'Yeah, it was kind of s**tty, but whatever,' he added.

A Speedo-clad Simpson then spoke about the negative response to his new romance from fans in Australia, saying that his fellow countrymen remain loyal to Miley's estranged husband, Liam Hemsworth.

'I'm copping s**t here because of [her] exes. You know, her husband is Australian,' Simpson said, according to an onlooker sitting nearby.

Scroll down for video

Trouble in paradise already? Cody Simpson was overheard complaining about his girlfriend, Miley Cyrus, on the phone at a public swimming pool in Sydney on Thursday morning

The onlooker said Simpson spent some time stretching and warming up before getting into the water and swimming a few laps of butterfly.

He then cooled off in the smaller pool, all the while being watched by a group of women who recognised him.

After his swim, Simpson then got on the phone where he used FaceTime to show a friend the view from the picturesque harbour pool.

On the rocks? Simpson, who wore Speedos under a pair of Daniel Patrick shorts, was overhead saying, 'We had a weird one yesterday... not really an argument but she kind of shut down'

Stressed? Simpson looked strained as he paced around the pool's edge while talking on the phone

The Golden Thing hitmaker flew into Sydney on Monday, just hours before he was unmasked as the Robot on the local version of The Masked Singer.

During his subsequent media rounds, he spoke about his blossoming relationship with Cyrus in virtually every TV and radio interview.

Homeland: Simpson flew into Sydney on Monday, just hours before he was unmasked as the Robot on the local version of The Masked Singer

Overheard: Simpson spoke about the negative response to his new romance from fans in Australia, saying that his fellow countrymen remain loyal to Miley's ex, Liam Hemsworth

Showing off: During his post-Masked Singer media rounds, Simpson spoke about his blossoming relationship with Miley in virtually every TV and radio interview

Speaking to Nova 96.9's Fitzy & Wippa on Tuesday, Simpson said: 'I told [Miley] I used to kiss her on the TV screen when I was little.

'She was the only one that I had ever felt that way about when I was that age. I had a crush on her ever since I knew who she was.'

Simpson and Cyrus began dating just two months after the American singer announced her separation from Hemsworth, whom she'd married in a private ceremony in December.

On the rebound: Simpson and Cyrus (left) began dating just two months after the American singer announced her separation from Hemsworth, whom she'd married in a private ceremony in December

In between her split from Hemsworth and romance with Simpson, Cyrus enjoyed a brief fling with Brody Jenner's reality star ex, Kaitlynn Carter.

Following his marriage breakdown, Hemsworth has mostly kept a low profile, but was recently pictured kissing actress Maddison Brown on a night out in New York.

Neither Hemsworth nor Brown has commented on their relationship.

Former flames: Miley and Liam Hemsworth (pictured in Malibu, California on June 6) announced the end of their marriage in August
description: An exasperated Cody Simpson was overheard complaining about his new love Miley Cyrus while enjoying a swim at a Sydney pool.
authors: Monique Friedlander For Daily Mail Australia
